title: Our vision
text: to create a community where young people are empowered to be agents of positive change in their communities. Through our projects, we aim to collaborate and work together to address local and global challenges. Therefore we fixed the following big milestones to reach our goals

section.title: orientation
section.content: launch the first orientation platform for students entrepreneurs and NGOs;

section.title: Hackatons
section.content: Annual Hackatons for students, entrepreneurs and startups;.

section.title: beneficiaries
section.content: Orient 1000 beneficiaries by the end of 2024;
